A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Phenomenal addition to not only the new trilogy\, but the Star Wars universe as a whole. Despite from the semi frequent humor copouts\, this film managed to keep me on the edge of my seat and take my breath away through sheer emotion during its many moments. This movie had callbacks\, but didn't bank all on them and forged its own plot. Very bold directing\, loved every minute of it.
